content:
From: Clemens Ballarin <ballarin@in.tum.de>
Dear Users of Isabelle,

I would like to draw your attention to the

Colloquium in Honour of the
Appointment of Lawrence C. Paulson as
Distinguished Affiliated Professor of the TU Muenchen

held in Garching near Munich on 30 May 2006. You are all cordially
invited. The full programme is available at
http://www4.in.tum.de/proj/theoremprov/Festkolloquium.pdf (in German).

If you would like to attend, please contact Ms Ursula Eschbach
(eschbach@in.tum.de) no later than 16 May 2006.

Kind regards,

Clemens Ballarin
